titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of Representative Julia Carson, of Indiana.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/17/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the Senate has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of the Honorable Julia Carson, late a Representative from the state of Indiana.
